mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANI_BRD_GALL_COMMENT (GALL_CMT_NO, GALL_NO, ID, GALL_CMT_CONTENT, GALL_CMT_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO) VALUES (ANI_BRD_GALL_CMT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gallNo}, #{id}, #{gallCmtContent}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, ANI_BRD_GALL_CMT_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.GALL_CMT_NO, A.GALL_NO, ID, A.GALL_CMT_CONTENT, A.GALL_CMT_CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, GALL_CMT_CREATE_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, GALL_CMT_NO, GALL_NO, ID, GALL_CMT_CONTENT, GALL_CMT_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO FROM ANI_BRD_GALL_COMMENT WHERE GALL_NO = #{gallNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALL_CMT_CONTENT (GALL_CMT_NO, GALL_NO, ID, GALL_CMT_CONTENT, GALL_CMT_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO) VALUES (ANI_BRD_GALL_CMT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gallNo}, #{id}, #{gallCmtContent}, SYSDATE 1, 1, #{groupNo})
